channel.title: Moparisthebest revolution

I am well aware Rednecks do have guns

That’s why my plan bypasses that threat. I am not attacking YOU, I am attacking everything you love (American car manufacturers). And you cannot kill me because I will be hundreds of miles away sitting in a leather chair pressing the fire button for the Nuclear Missiles.

There’s no escape Maniacal Laugh[/quote]

item.title: Moparisthebest revolution
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

Ahh my fellow comrades, Regroup! for Reckoning Day is upon us!

Ok here’s how our Revolution is going to go down:

VG_Kobra is your 4th Reich. (For once a Reich who does not hold facist but communist beliefs )
Thief will be my trusty sidekick Vladimir Ilyich Lenin
Bubblescum will be Karl Marx.
Insert Asian Name will be Mao Zedong.

Now we kill the Jews (Noobs) and create equality for all. Which means if you have sex with a hot girl as should I
BTW Equality does not involve use removing our CM Status. I’m afriad that’s a Divine Un-Abolishable Rule

Now for the good part:

We shall steal arms from the U.S by tricking an incompetent General to make him believe a Terrorist is going to attack and engage the Nuclear Modules. Then we shall kill him and threaten Mopar to surrender the site to us otherwise we shall bomb the entire Chevy, GM and Chrysler Factories…

The Bastard doesn’t have a chance…

Read full topic
